revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tower of Darkness |image = [[File:Tower of Darkness.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Tower of Darkness. |tokens = 2,000,000 |location = North of Challenge Road }} '''Tower of Darkness''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 28,886,112 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
